snippet: Two Coast Guard members were fatally shot Thursday at a communications station on Kodiak Island in what officials said appeared to be a double homicide.
abstract: Two Coast Guard members are fatally shot at a communications station on Kodiak Island, Alaska.
lead_paragraph: Two Coast Guard members were fatally shot Thursday at a communications station on Kodiak Island in what officials said appeared to be a double homicide.

headline.main: Alaska: 2 Dead at Coast Guard Station
headline.print_headline: Alaska: 2 Dead at Coast Guard Station
